C

challenged(String) - Method in class Client.ClientController
Receives a challenge from the player and responds by accepting or declining.
challenged(String) - Method in class View.ClientGUI
Opens a window in which the user can select to accept the challenge from the given player name or decline it.
clearActivePlayers() - Method in class View.ServerGui
Clears the ActivePlayers TextArea
clearCurrentGames() - Method in class View.ServerGui
Clears the CurrentGames TextArea
Client - package Client
 
Client - Class in tester
Client class for a simple client-server application
Client() - Constructor for class tester.Client
 
ClientConnectionHandler - Class in Client
Starts and keeps a connection running with a server and passes messages on over this connection.
ClientConnectionHandler(Socket, ClientController) - Constructor for class Client.ClientConnectionHandler
Makes a new ClientConnectionHandler on the given socket.
ClientController - Class in Client
Makes the model, gui and connectionHandler for the client and shares information between them.
ClientController() - Constructor for class Client.ClientController
Makes a new GUI.
clientError(String) - Method in exception Error.Error
Send an AMULET-ERROR message to the client, with an explanation in errorMessage
ClientGUI - Class in View
A ClientGUI that shows an graphical interface for the client/user to use.
ClientGUI(ActionListener) - Constructor for class View.ClientGUI
Starts the ClientGUI and saves the given controller.
closeConnection(String) - Method in class Client.ClientConnectionHandler
 
closeListener() - Method in class Server.ServerSocketListener
Stops the loop in the run method and closes the ServerSocket.
commandReader(String) - Method in class Client.ClientConnectionHandler
Reads a received command and passes this on to the ClientController.
commandReader(String) - Method in class Server.ConnectionHandler
Switches all the commands in the AMULET protocol to the right parts of the system using a switch If there is a violation of the AMULET protocol it throws an Error with a descriptive message.
connectionBroken() - Method in class View.ClientGUI
Tells the gui that the connection with the server has been broken.
connectionClosed(String) - Method in class Client.ClientController
Tells the GUI that the connection has been broken and a new connection can be made.
ConnectionHandler - Class in Server
Manages a single TCP connection with a Player.
ConnectionHandler(ServerController, Socket) - Constructor for class Server.ConnectionHandler
Creates a BufferedReader connected to the inputstream of this socket.
convertHandlerToInt(ConnectionHandler) - Method in class Server.GameController
Returns the Integer representation of the ConnectionHandler Object because the Game class uses integers.
copy() - Method in class Model.Board
Makes a copy of the current board
